entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
